[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin](./react-rsbuild-plugin.md) &gt; [CompatVisitorConfig](./react-rsbuild-plugin.compatvisitorconfig.md) &gt; [newRuntimePkg](./react-rsbuild-plugin.compatvisitorconfig.newruntimepkg.md)

## CompatVisitorConfig.newRuntimePkg property

Specifies the new runtime package name

**Signature:**

```typescript
newRuntimePkg: string
```

## Remarks

Default value: `'@lynx-js/react'`

## Example


```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'
import { pluginReactLynx } from '@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginReactLynx({
      compat: {
        newRuntimePkg: '@my-org/react'
      },
    })
  ],
})
```
